content:
Molecular biologist, bioinformatician
  Hello, there! I’m Thyago. I’m a biologist who likes computers, programming and biostatistics! I’m a strong advocate for open(science, data, source) and reproducible research. My main goal is to use biology and computational tools to understand biological phenomena relevant to human and other living beings. During my graduation I worked mainly with transcriptomics, genomics and molecular biology, both wet and dry benches.
  My most frequently used programming languages are R (stats, data wrangling, data viz.), Python (snakemake pipelines, automation, machine learning) and Bash/Zsh (automation, linux management). I’m also beginner with C++.
  In my free time I enjoy reading, meditating, painting, hiking, music, pets, and learning new stuff.
 Download my resumé. --

title: Thyago Leal Calvo
